Package index

Declare

These functions declare research design steps

declare_model()
Declare the size and features of the population
declare_inquiry() declare_inquiries() declare_estimand() declare_estimands() inquiry_handler()
Declare inquiry
declare_sampling() sampling_handler()
Declare sampling procedure
declare_assignment() assignment_handler()
Declare Data Strategy: Assignment
declare_measurement() measurement_handler()
Declare measurement procedure
declare_estimator() declare_estimators() label_estimator() method_handler()
Declare estimator
declare_test() label_test()
Declare test
declare_step()
Declare a custom step
set_citation()
Set the citation of a design
tidy_try()
Tidy Model Results and Filter to Relevant Coefficients
`+`(<dd>)
Declare a design

Post-declaration functions

These functions operate on declared designs

cite_design()
Obtain the preferred citation for a design
draw_data() draw_estimand() draw_estimands() draw_estimates()
Draw data, estimates, and inquiries from a design
run_design()
Run a design one time
get_estimates()
Get estimates, inquiries, assignment vectors, or samples from a design given data
print_code() print(<design>) summary(<design>)
Explore your design

Diagnose

These functions assist with research design diagnosis

diagnosand_handler() declare_diagnosands()
Declare diagnosands
diagnose_design() diagnose_designs() vars()
Diagnose the design
get_diagnosands() get_simulations()
Explore your design diagnosis
simulate_design() simulate_designs()
Simulate a design
set_diagnosands()
Set the diagnosands for a design
reshape_diagnosis()
Clean up a diagnosis object for printing
tidy(<diagnosis>)
Tidy diagnosis
pop.var()
Population variance function

Redesign

These functions modify declared designs

insert_step() delete_step() replace_step()
Modify a design after the fact
expand_design()
Declare a design via a designer
redesign()
Redesign

Comparison

These functions compare declared designs

compare_diagnoses()
Compare Diagnoses
compare_designs() compare_design_code() compare_design_summaries() compare_design_data() compare_design_estimates() compare_design_inquiries()
Compare two designs
